other_tests.findings: Identified a single, novel heterozygous variant (p.Arg71*) in nicotinamide nucleotide transhydrogenase (NNT) in both affected individuals.
Identified a 69-bp pseudoexon inclusion event in the proband and confirmed the presence of a 4-bp duplication responsible for its activation.
Base cortisol level was 38 nmol/L and peaked at 580 nmol/L at 60 minutes (NR, 550 nmol/L).
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 8 months of age, a second short Synacthen test was performed, with a peak cortisol level of 130 nmol/L, consistent with adrenal insufficiency.
